socialDescription: MENJames Love, DenverPropelled by a 63 in the second round on the Palm Valley GC in Goodyear, Ariz., the senior from Calgary shot a school-record 17-under 199 to win the Ron Moore Invitational by...
body:
__[__

[#image: /photos/55ad700db01eefe207f66a19]|||Love_2|||](/images/blog/posts/photos/uncategorized/love_2.jpg)















 MEN







__[James Love](http://denverpioneers.collegesports.com/sports/m-golf/mtt/love_james00.html), Denver__







Propelled by a 63 in the second round on the Palm Valley GC in Goodyear, Ariz., the senior from Calgary [shot a school-record 17-under 199 to win the Ron Moore Invitational](http://denverpioneers.collegesports.com/sports/m-golf/recaps/032106aaa.html) by four shots over Nebraska’s [__Brady Schnell__](http://www.huskers.com/ViewArticle.dbml?SPSID=122&SPID=35&DB_OEM_ID=100&ATCLID=32974&Q_SEASON=2005). It was the third career victory for Love ([his ’05 Barona Cup win included a 62](http://denverpioneers.collegesports.com/sports/m-golf/recaps/102505aaa.html)), who has broken par in each of his last eight rounds. (Photo courtesy of the [Denver University](http://www.du.edu/).)





__Honorable Mentions:__







[__Blaine Peffley__](http://umterps.collegesports.com/sports/m-golf/mtt/peffley_blaine00.html), Maryland—medalist at the [Furman Intercollegiate](http://umterps.collegesports.com/sports/m-golf/recaps/032706aaa.html) (10-under 206)







[__Colt Knost__](http://smumustangs.collegesports.com/sports/m-golf/mtt/knost_colt00.html), SMU—repeated as medalist at [Pinehurst Intercollegiate](http://smumustangs.collegesports.com/sports/m-golf/recaps/032106aaa.html) (1-under 143)







__[__

[#image: /photos/55ad700dadd713143b421572]|||Marci_turner_headshot_1|||](/images/blog/posts/photos/uncategorized/marci_turner_headshot_1.jpg)















 WOMEN







[Marci Turner](http://utladyvols.collegesports.com/sports/w-golf/mtt/turner_marci00.html), Tennessee







The sophomore led the Lady Vols to a dominating 38-shot win over New Mexico at the Dr. Donnis Thompson Invitational in Hawaii, with Tennessee shooting a four-over 856, 10 shots better than the school’s previous 54-hole best. Individually, [Turner’s final-round 64 at the Kaneohe Klipper course gave her a three-under 210](http://utladyvols.collegesports.com/sports/w-golf/recaps/032306aaa.html), to beat teammate [__Golda Johansson__](http://utladyvols.collegesports.com/sports/w-golf/mtt/johansson_golda00.html) by four. (Photo courtesy of the [University of Tennessee](http://www.utk.edu).)





__Honorable Mentions:__







[__Caroline Westrup__](http://seminoles.collegesports.com/sports/w-golf/mtt/westrup_caroline00.html), Maryland—medalist at [Liz Murphey Collegiate](http://seminoles.collegesports.com/sports/w-golf/recaps/032606aab.html) (5-over 221)







[__Adriana Zwanck__](http://www.arizonaathletics.com/ViewArticle.dbml?SPSID=8428&SPID=530&DB_OEM_ID=1600&ATCLID=218583), Arizona—medalist at the [Mountain View Intercollegiate](http://www.arizonaathletics.com/ViewArticle.dbml?SPSID=8428&SPID=530&DB_OEM_ID=1600&ATCLID=251120) (3-under 213)
